<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Check file uploads"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/{folderId}/upload/check"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks the file uploads to the folder with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"folderId","in":"path","description":"The folder ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":9846}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The request parameters for checking file uploads.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"filesTitle":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"The list of file titles.","nullable":true,"example":["some text"]}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for checking file uploads.","title":"CheckUploadRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Inserted file","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"STRINGArrayWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
